description: Adds movie threads started to criteria
replace:
<xf:option name="user_criteria[movies_posted][rule]" value="movies_posted" selected="{$criteria.movies_posted}"
	label="{{ phrase('snog_movies_started_x_threads') }}">
	<xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[movies_posted][data][movies]" value="{$criteria.movies_posted.movies}"
		size="5" min="0" step="1" />
</xf:option>
$0
